scripts.test: npm run build && npm --no-spin run test-self; npm --no-spin run test-rest-all
scripts.test-rest: npm run backbone-rest vendor-install && mocha --require backbone-rest/test/parameters_express3 'node_modules/backbone-rest/test/spec/**/*.tests.coffee' --grep ''
scripts.test-rest-all: npm run pre-test-rest && echo node_modules/backbone-rest/test/parameters_*.coffee | xargs -n1 -J % mocha --require % 'node_modules/backbone-rest/test/spec/**/*.tests.coffee' --grep ''
scripts.pre-test-rest: npm run backbone-rest vendor-install && cd node_modules/backbone-rest && npm ls >/dev/null || npm install
scripts.build_dep: npm run-script backbone-orm build; npm run-script backbone-rest build
scripts.watch_dep: npm run-script backbone-orm watch; npm run-script backbone-rest watch
